title: Oil review. No. 08
creator_credit: Greenpark Productions, Film Producers Guild, Humphrey Swingler and Joe Mendoza
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: 1. Desert tractors: contrasting these vehicles with the camel caravan in conveying refinery equipment across the desert. 2. Bottled gas: showing the value of this fuel in outlying small areas and explaining methods of delivery of supples. 3. Bunkering the “Chusan”: pumping fuel oil into the 24,000-ton ocean liner.
